CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 5, 1955, pg. 21B, reads: "'Life Is Art' - Life and art are synonymous, Ray Saunders (center with lettered T-shirt) tell you. And for that reason, he enjoys association with people regardless of whether they are fellow artists or youngsters like the ones above whom he instructed at Madison Playground the past summer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children and adolescents, including Milton Swan Jr. near center, Sharon Goode wearing light colored t-shirt and capri pants with plaid cuffs, boy wearing sailor hat, and Raymond "Ray" Saunders wearing Dept. of Parks and Recreation t-shirt, gathered at Madison Elementary School playground across from Herron Hill Park
